scriptures.text: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you … Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
Learn of me, and listen to my words; walk in the meekness of my Spirit, and you shall have peace in me.
But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.

quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson
quotes.text: Peace is not found in the absence of conflict but in the presence of Christ.

quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson
quotes.text: As we seek Him, as we learn of Him, as we come to Him, we find rest from the cares of this world.

quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson
quotes.text: True peace comes only by faith and obedience.

scriptures.text: Wherefore, whoso believeth in God might with surety hope for a better world.
Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the Lord.
Therefore, continue your journey and let your hearts rejoice; for behold, and lo, I am with you even unto the end.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Hope is a gift of the Spirit. It is hope that encourages and inspires us to press forward.

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.text: With God, there is no point of no return.

quotes.author: James E. Faust
quotes.text: Hope is trust in God's promises, faith that if we act now, the desired blessings will be fulfilled in the future.

scriptures.text: And it came to pass that we lived after the manner of happiness.
Godliness with contentment is great gain.
Be content with the things which ye have.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Gratitude is the catalyst to all Christlike attributes. A thankful heart is the parent of all virtues.

quotes.author: Harold B. Lee
quotes.text: Happiness does not depend on what happens outside of you but on what happens inside of you.

quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
quotes.text: The true source of happiness is living the gospel of Jesus Christ.

scriptures.text: Men are, that they might have joy.
Be glad in the Lord, and rejoice, ye righteous: and shout for joy, all ye that are upright in heart.
Thou hast made known to me the ways of life; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance.

quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson
quotes.text: The joy we feel has little to do with the circumstances of our lives and everything to do with the focus of our lives.

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.text: In the gospel of Jesus Christ you have help from both sides of the veil, and you must never forget that.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: Joy is the gift of God, and when we focus on Him, our joy increases.

scriptures.text: Seek ye out of the best books words of wisdom; seek learning, even by study and also by faith.
The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God.
I will tell you in your mind and in your heart, by the Holy Ghost, which shall come upon you.

quotes.author: Camilla E. Kimball
quotes.text: Never suppress a generous thought.

quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson
quotes.text: Inspiration comes when we are on the move.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: If we will listen, the Lord will teach us what we need to know for our own journey.

scriptures.text: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
Live in thanksgiving daily, for the many mercies and blessings which he doth bestow upon you.
Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: We can choose to be grateful, no matter what.

quotes.author: Melody Beattie
quotes.text: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.

quotes.author: M. Russell Ballard
quotes.text: Gratitude is an expression of faith and a recognition that all good comes from God.

scriptures.text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the Lord thy God is with thee.

quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson
quotes.text: You are stronger than you think. You can do more than you imagine.

quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson
quotes.text: With faith in the Lord, you can do difficult things.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Heavenly Father will give you the strength and capacity you need in every challenge.

scriptures.text: Seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally.
For he that diligently seeketh shall find; and the mysteries of God shall be unfolded unto them.

quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
quotes.text: Inspiration comes more easily when we are moving forward with faith.

quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson
quotes.text: Ask questions. Be curious. But let your curiosity lead you to the scriptures, to prayer, and to the Spirit.

quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer
quotes.text: The Lord will teach you line upon line, precept upon precept, as you seek knowledge.

scriptures.text: Be still, and know that I am God.
Look unto me in every thought; doubt not, fear not.
Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you… Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Do not fear. God's love is stronger than your fears.

quotes.author: M. Russell Ballard
quotes.text: Hope is never lost when faith is in the Lord Jesus Christ.

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.text: He will calm the troubled waters of your life.

scriptures.text: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.
He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord God will wipe away tears from off all faces.
The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.

quotes.author: Richard G. Scott
quotes.text: It is in the depth of sorrow that the Savior's healing power is most felt.

quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
quotes.text: Every tear today will eventually be returned a hundredfold with tears of rejoicing.

quotes.author: Moroni 7:3
quotes.text: Come unto Christ and you will find rest and peace for your soul.

scriptures.text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
Cast thy burden upon the Lord, and he shall sustain thee.
My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: You don't have to do everything. You just have to do what matters most.

quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball
quotes.text: God does notice us, and He watches over us. But it is usually through another person that He meets our needs.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: The Lord will help you carry your load when it feels too heavy to bear.

scriptures.text: Be not weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
And if men come unto me I will show unto them their weakness.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Patience is not simply enduring; it is the ability to accept delays and difficulties without frustration.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: Sometimes the Lord allows us to struggle to help us grow stronger.

quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson
quotes.text: When we are frustrated, we can turn to the Lord and He will help us see a better perspective.

scriptures.text: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you.
Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: When we are under pressure, God's Spirit can calm our hearts if we seek Him.” .

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.text: The Lord knows your burdens and will strengthen you when you feel overwhelmed.

quotes.author: Richard G. Scott
quotes.text: Stress is a signal to seek the Lord's guidance and lean on His power.

scriptures.text: I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him.
Come unto me, all ye that are weary and heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Even when you feel alone, God is aware of your needs.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: You are never truly alone; the Savior walks beside you.

quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson
quotes.text: Seek service and connection, and loneliness will fade.

scriptures.text: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally.
Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.” .

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Faith is trusting in the Lord even when the path isn't clear.

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.text: Confusion is an opportunity to learn to rely on the Spirit.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: The Lord will guide you step by step when you are unsure.

scriptures.text: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.
The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart.
And the spirit shall be poured out upon you from on high; and ye shall be comforted.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: The Savior knows your grief and can give you peace.

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.text: Time and faith in the Lord will heal even the deepest sorrow.

quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson
quotes.text: Your tears are precious, and the Lord will comfort you.

scriptures.text: Awake, thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.
Wherefore, be not weary in well doing.
He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Even small steps of faith can awaken a dormant heart.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: Acting in goodness, even when you feel numb, brings life to the soul.

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.text: Engage in service; it rekindles the spirit.

scriptures.text: A soft answer turneth away wrath.
Cease from anger, and forsake wrath.” .
Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Pause and seek the Lord when irritation arises.

quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson
quotes.text: Control your emotions and act with love, not frustration.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: Peace comes from patience and understanding, not impulse.

scriptures.text: The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart.
I will strengthen thee, yea, I will help thee.
Fear thou not; for I am with thee.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Vulnerability is a doorway to God's strength.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: When we share our hearts, we allow God to lift us.

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the willingness to trust God in weakness.

scriptures.text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed.” .
They that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength.

quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quotes.text: Resilience comes from faith, not from avoiding challenges.

quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring
quotes.text: The Lord helps those who keep moving forward despite setbacks.

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.text: Strength grows as we persist and trust in God's timing.
